lead_paragraph: Carlos Bocanegra and Oguchi Onyewu headed in first-half goals, the substitute Eddie Lewis scored in the second half, and the United States beat host Poland, 3-0, in an exhibition game Wednesday night in Krakow. The three-goal margin of victory was the largest for the Americans in Europe since a 3-0 victory against Austria in 1998. The United States opens World Cup qualifying June 15 against Barbados at Carson, Calif.
